tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ReorderRequests (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    current_inventory INT,
    reorder_level INT,
    reorder_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    order_quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    delivery_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryLevels (
    ProductID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ProductName VARCHAR(255),
    CurrentStock INT,
    MinStockLevel INT,
    MaxStockLevel INT
);
